roleset.name: weaken, not quantifiable, weaken from below

example.name: active
example.text: The index was under pressure for most of the morning over concerns that the effects of Tuesday night's major earthquake in the San Francisco area would undermine the U.S. market.
example.arg: the effects of Tuesday night's major earthquake in the San Francisco area

example.name: passive
example.text: He argues that [efforts to firm up prices]-1 will be undermined *trace*-1 by producers' plans to expand production capacity.
example.arg: by producers' plans to expand production capacity

example.name: arg1 and MNR
example.text: Progressives should be against de-funding and undermining of social security , in whatever form it takes .

roleset.note:
UNDERMINE-V NOTES: "Not quantifiable" means that undermine cannot take EXT, start or endpoint arguments, unlike weaken. (Although I think certain example sentences might completely undermine the argument about not taking EXT.)No Verbnet entry. Comparison with weaken. (from undermine.01-v)
UNDERMINING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from undermining.01-n)

roleset.name: surgically seperate from underlying structure

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: extensive undermining of skin from the gland

roleset.note: UNDERMINING-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to separate.01. Separate.01 is a member of VN classes separate-23.1-2, remove-10.1, and classify -29.10. Framed by Katie. (from undermining.02-n)
